ygData.subject: Re: New Idea.
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I have the highest possible faction (reguards you kindly or something) and none of those people have said anything different to me.  I ve done pretty much
ygData.messageBody:
Well I have the highest possible faction (reguards you kindly or something)
and none of those people have said anything different to me. I've done
pretty much all the other quests that work. (the cargo clockwork never
worked) You know I had the same idea about the zookeeper. :) But when you
go down to him, he has a different name. The zookeeper in the book was
something like Vlsgig.

---
gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land - http://www.juju.org

you've been rebooting Windows NT" - Infoworld

necro
